name: Forest Fire (JNI)
description:
Description

Forest Fire is a top down game where you try to stop forest fires created in 3 days for Ludum Dare 50 Delay the inevitable. The player spawns on a watch tower with some equipment to stop fires. Fires are spreading quickly, so you have to be fast. But there is no winning, you can only delay the inevitable! The game is over when the player dies or most of the forest is burned down.

For an optimal experience and performance, use one of the desktop builds in the download section instead of the web player!

Controls W/A/S/DMovementShiftDash
EPick up Item
LMB/SpaceUse Item
Mouse Scroll
Camera Zoom
EscapePause
Guide This is where you spawn. Items that can be used to extinguish fires are marked in red.Buckets can be picked up [E] and filled with water at water barrels [E]. Buckets with water inside can be spilled [LMB/Space]. While filling a bucket, you can hold [E] to fill more water into the bucket. The more water is inside, the more fire will be extinguished. The amount of water in the bucket can be seen in the bottom left corner.
Fire extinguishers can be picked up with [E] and used by holding [LMB/Space]. Fire extinguishers have a limited capacity, which can be seen in the bottom left corner. This item does not respawn and only a limited quantity is available on the map.
Flares can be picked up with [E] and thrown with [LMB/Space]. Flares will emit smoke which will cause a plane to spawn and drop a large amount of water/foam above the flare. Only 3 flares are available on the map so dont use them all at once.
Install instructions

Download and extract the zip-file, that's all. Thanks for playing!
